item.title: More case issues
item.dc:creator: @wookiezz wookiezz
item.description:
@wookiezz wrote:

Ok so in my first problem it was solved but then i started trying to use cases that havnt been used for the switch method.

case 4116346: // Random packet. switch (variable) { case 50: //Unstrung shortbow if(usedWith == 1777){ p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You string the unstrung bow."); pi.deleteItem(p, 50, usedSlot, 1); pi.deleteItem(p, 1777, usedWithSlot, 1); pi.addItem(p, 841, 1); p.addSkillXP(100 * p.skillLvl[9], 9); } break;

4 million does seem very unrealistic but i tried 10 thousand and then 100 thousand.

I donâ€™t know if theres a limit or what but it gives me the same error.

.\net\com\codeusa\net\packethandler\ItemOnItem.java:30: orphaned case case 4116346: // Random packet. ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

Help is appretiated.

Thanks,
Wookiezz
